ValidationRule.description: GTMS-26117: Created as part of Partners H1 project to throw error if Source Payout % field is empty when Source Payout Model is selected as Percentage
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You’ve selected ‘Percentage’ for the Sourced Payout Model, but have not included the desired percentage amount. Please update the 'Sourced Payout Percentage” to a number greater than 0 and lower than 100 to save this program
